Package org.graffiti.core

Class GenericFileFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter
      • org.graffiti.core.GenericFileFilter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GravistoFileFilter
    public class GenericFileFilter
extends FileFilter
    Contains a generic file filter for filtering file extensions in the file chooser dialog.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.5 $
